title: Complementary and Alternative Medicine: What are the advantages and disadvantages of Ayurveda?
description: Answer (1 of 6): Ayurveda (Sanskrit:  yurveda , "life-knowledge"; English pronunciation /a.rved/) or Ayurvedic medicine is a system of traditional Hindu medicine native to the Indian subcontinent. Contemporary practices derived from Ayurvedic traditions are a type of alternative me...
